meanings.definition: A hernia in which a portion of the intestine protrudes through the abdominal wall.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with an enterocoele after examining the bulge in the abdomen.
meanings.sent2: She underwent surgery to repair the enterocoele and prevent further complications.
meanings.sent3: The enterocoele decided to take a peek outside the abdomen, causing quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The enterocoele was like a curious explorer venturing beyond the boundaries of the abdomen.
meanings.sent5: The image of the enterocoele pushing through the abdominal wall was etched in his mind.

meanings.definition: The condition of having an enterocoele.
meanings.sent1: Her discomfort was due to the presence of an enterocoele in her abdomen.
meanings.sent2: Living with an enterocoele can be challenging and require regular medical monitoring.
meanings.sent3: The enterocoele seemed to have its own personality, causing mischief in her belly.
meanings.sent4: The burden of the enterocoele weighed heavily on her daily activities.
meanings.sent5: The reality of her enterocoele condition hit her when she felt the pain intensify.
